#summary Networked Variable api

=Networked Variable (nv)=
nsdci/dcicommon/nv.c

==Introduction==
The Networked Variable api (nv) is used to stream key-value updates to remote clients.   Used as an in-memory array on multiple servers, the array is networked so a set or update on the origin server is reflected on the clients.
